page.title: 17TRANSPORT IN HOLTON-LE-CLAY
page.content: Danny runs a private mini bus service. Danny's bus also runs to Louth to take children to school in the morning and back home again after school. He regularly takes people to Grimsby shopping. In Holton-le-Clay there is a Lincolnshire Road Car Service. The buses go to Grimsby and Louth. Single tickets to Grimsby cost 64 pence and return tickets cost 85 pence. The buses run every hour. Ron Ramsden is a superstore in Grimsby. They run a bus service to their store each Thursday at 9.30 a.m. returning to Holton-le-Clay at 11.30a.m. A similar service from Hillards Superstore, Grimsby, leaving Holton-le-Clay at 9.30a.m. and returning at 10.30a.m. A railway used to run from Louth to Grimsby. It has now closed down.
